page.title: 08EVERYDAY LIFE IN PENDLESIDE
page.content: {PAUL COATES(10}(3rdgeneration in area) I get up at 7-30each morning, wash and dress,then go down to warm some milk for 2 lambs(takes about 5mins.)Get some minced meat for my ferret, then go for my breakfast.I go to school(by car,or walk with other children)We do different lessons and play football or other games at break.After school I go home and feed the lambs and ferret and have a cup of tea and biscuits.Then I get my motorbike and trailer to take about 50bales of straw.Then I have my tea,watchT.V.have a bath and goto bed. {STEPHEN DUNTHORNE(8)}(recent arrival) I get up about 8a.m &have breakfast (usually Frosties cereal) Then I get dressed and go to school.First we have prayers,then Read,Write&doSums After lunch we work,paint or play&ourteacher reads to us.At home I watchT.V or read My favourite tea is Scampi&chips.
